item.title: First Blog Post
item.description: First post! So I had a look at static site generators like Jekyll, but since Hugo is built on Go, I settled for Hugo. At first I had some troubles with settling for a theme, because there are quite a few out there. Harbor looked really nice, but I had to fix the example config.toml file first before really using it. Anyways check out my instrument tuner which I wrote a while ago.
